external_references.description: Ernesto Fernández Provecho, Pham Duy Phuc, Ciana Driscoll & Vinoo Thomas. (2023, November 21). The Continued Evolution of the DarkGate Malware-as-a-Service. Retrieved February 9, 2024.
McGraw, T. (2024, December 4). Black Basta Ransomware Campaign Drops Zbot, DarkGate, and Custom Malware. Retrieved December 9, 2024.

objects.description: [DarkGate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1111) uses a malicious Windows Batch script to run the Windows code utility to retrieve follow-on script payloads.(Citation: Trellix Darkgate 2023) [DarkGate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1111) has also used `cmd.exe` to create a remote shell.(Citation: Rapid7 BlackBasta 2024)
